entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 7 SDK's dotnet.exe change the attached terminal code page when its standard output is redirected #30170
  • ResolvePackageAssets: DisablePackageAssetsCache still requires a valid project.assets.json to exist #30167

Closed

  • Issue with building and publishing Asp.Net 4 website in docker file #30100

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge 3xx to main #30174
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding extra check to identity on template installation #30163

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2098470 #30128
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move to osx 12 #30149
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [Breaking] `RuntimeIdentifier` No Longer Implies `SelfContained` Apps by Default #30038
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for new output path format #29599
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30060
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Add Visual Basic module template #30139
  • add named monitor for fixing floating tests #30138
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Refactor CSharpSyntaxWrite. Introduce OneLineStatementSyntaxRewriter, FieldDeclarationSyntaxRewriter. Add Tests for SyntaxRewriter(s). #30141
    Area-GenAPI
